title: Best of The Herd: 06/15/2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/15/2020
description:
With Doug in for Colin. Kyrie Irving's concerns on the NBA returning this season, Cam Newton continuing to get no interests from NFL teams.

Guests: Fox Sports host Chris Broussard and Bleacher Report writer Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
